pages.text: $(li)The Packed Ice is a translucent solid block that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/snow/ice_spikes)Ice Spikes$(/l).$(br)$(li)You will walk slower and slide on this block, but if you jump you will go faster on it.
$(li)Unlike $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/ice)Ice$(/l), it will not be destroyed if a light source, such as a $(l:patchouli:decoration/others/torchs)Torch$(/l), is near it.
